General.Name: Frontier Energy Corp
General.Description: Frontier Energy Corporation engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and operation of oil and gas reserves primarily in the United States. The company was formerly known as GT DATA Corp. and changed its name to Frontier Energy Corporation in September 2005. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Edmonton, Canada.
General.Address: 8904-60th Avenue NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T6E 6A6
